original_text: With the sacrifice of his peace offerings for thanksgiving he shall bring his offering with loaves of leavened bread.
korean_text: 또 유교병을 화목제의 감사제물과 함께 그 예물로 드리되

sentences.original_text: With the sacrifice of his peace offerings for thanksgiving
sentences.korean_translation: 감사를 위한 그의 화목 제물과 함께
